name: Blade of Eternal Justice
tooltip:
Blade of Eternal JusticeLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Spiked Hilt, 2  Amber Idols, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Spiked Hilt
- Amber Idol x 2
- Bronze Scarab x 5
- Ivory Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
